oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Kenneth Hinson Letterhead
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hatch Show Print (Firm); Offset printing;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Four color letterhead (black, blue, orange, and silver on white) for Kenneth Hinson. The letterhead contains the text, "Hobby printing, cachets, artwork," and features a picture of a 3 cent postage stamp with an image of David (Davy) Crockett fighting in the Battle of the Alamo. It is possible that this letterhead was printed on the offset press.
